title: Large-Scale Blended Language Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language learning and practical fieldwork experience
context.additional_context: Customized design to strengthen workplace relevance and digital literacy for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can independently complete given language tasks in blended learning environments with over 80% completion rate
Learners provide at least three peer feedbacks using online collaboration tools while applying critical thinking
Learners conduct at least two self-assessments of their language learning performance using digital analysis tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
